channel.title: [317delta]why when i pk at edge and varrock i dont lose items.[317delta]
channel.description: i need to know where to change that when you die you lose everything

item.title: [317delta]why when i pk at edge and varrock i dont lose items.[317delta]
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“SandScape, post:3, topic:260274”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=343636.msg2653940#msg2653940 date=1233711767]
Change the applydead() method.
[/quote]ok you people always talk about change this and that but you dont tell wheres it located at and thats not alot of help wtf please give more details[/quote]
It’s in your Client.Java.
There’s more than one method, so you must choose the appropriate one to accommodate your coordinates.

Read full topic
